verses.roman:
mano-duḥkhe bhāla bhikṣā nā dila sei dine
mora bhāgye punarapi pāiluṅ daraśane

synonyms: mano-duḥkhe—out of great mental distress; bhāla bhikṣā—good lunch; nā dila—could not give You; sei dine—that day; mora bhāgye—because of my good fortune; punarapi—again; pāiluṅ—I have gotten; daraśane—visit.
translation: "Due to my mental distress I could not give You a very nice lunch the other day. Now, by good fortune, You have come again to my home."
